hero.title: Intuitive hotelspot digital concierge app for hotels
hero.desc: Intuitive hotelspot digital concierge app for hotels which allows guests full access to various services and informations, enhancing their comfort and convenience during their stay.

product.title: Exceptional and unique design
product.desc: Digital concierge is an app with 24/7 access to information, presentation of all hotel amenities, and promotion of special offers using digital technology

IncreasedRevenue.title: Increased revenue
IncreasedRevenue.desc: By promoting and reccomending of all hotel services, as well as local attractions, you will significantly increase the hotel's revenue.

ImprovingGuest.title: Improved guest service
ImprovingGuest.desc: Digital POD will provice fast and effective information for guests 24/7, elimination the need to wait at the reception. Effectively enhance guest satisfaction.

TaskAutomation.title: Automation of routine tasks
TaskAutomation.desc: The digital concierge automates many routine tasks, allowing employees to focus on more complex tasks.

SaveTime.title: Time savings
SaveTime.desc: Guests will quickly get answers to their questions without the need to wait in queues.

Personalizing.title: Personalization of Guest Experiences
Personalizing.desc: Thanks to data analysis and artificial intelligence, the digital concierge will provide personalized recommendations, advice, and information.

CostReduction.title: Cost Reduction
CostReduction.desc: Clearly reduced operational costs through, for example, a reduction in the printing of informational advertising materials, optimizing the number of receptionists, and many others.

LocalAttractions.title: Local Attractions
LocalAttractions.desc: Share recommendations of local attractions: museums, interesting places, events, restaurants.

VoiceAssistant.title: Voice Assistant
VoiceAssistant.desc: Respond in your guests native language thanks to the build-in automatic tranlation tool.

MobileApp.title: Mobile App
MobileApp.desc: Elevate your offering to a higher level. Inform and sell your services directly through the mobile app.

LocalAttractions.desc: Share recommendations of local attractions: museums, interesting places, events, restaurants.

VoiceAssistant.title: Voice Assistant
VoiceAssistant.desc: Respond in your guests native language thanks to the build-in automatic tranlation tool

MobileApp.title: Mobile App
MobileApp.desc: Elevate your offering to a higher level. Inform and sell your services directly through the mobile app.

RestaurantHotel.title: Hotel Restaurant
RestaurantHotel.desc: Seasonal menu or special lunch offer? With our app, you will increase the number of reservations and restaurant guests.

OrderTaxi.title: Order a Taxi
OrderTaxi.desc: Hotel guests will easily order a taxi directly from the POD without the need for stall assistance.

SpecialOffer.title: Special Offers
SpecialOffer.desc: Promote special offers in advance and increase the chances of direct bookings and guest returns.

Events.title: Hotel events
Events.desc: Do you organize movie screenings, children animations, group cheering event? Inform guests about the events organized at the hotel and gain additional revenue.

Opinion.title: Leave your review
Opinion.desc: Thanks to reviews and their analysis, you will enhance the quality of the services offered.

cta.title: Let's talk about the details
cta.desc: Get answers to your burning questions in an individual conversation with one of our experts. Together, we will find the best solution for your hotel.

pod.label: STATIONARY POD
pod.title: Voice Assistant
pod.desc: Thanks to advanced speech recognition and instatn access to information, the voice assistant will provide answers in any language instantly!

mobileApp.label: MOBILE APP
mobileApp.title: Chat Bot
mobileApp.desc: Discover a new dimension of communication with guests, enhancing the quality of their experiences through the latest artificial intelligence-based solutions.

mobileApp.title: MOBILE APP
mobileApp.desc: The service is also available as an application for all guests, regardless of whether they are using a smarpthone, tablet or computer.

conferenceManager.title: Conference Management
conferenceManager.desc: The conference management app is a versatile tool that enables organizers to effectively plan, monitor, and coordinate all aspects of the conference.

FaultManagement.title: Defect Management
FaultManagement.desc: The defect management app for hotels is an innovative tool that enables efficient monitoring and reporting of any technical issues or damages in the hotel property.

offers.title: Offer for Hotels
offers.desc: It is the perfect spot where suppliers can showcase their latest products and services, and hotels can easily find innovative solutions tailored to their needs. The diverse range of offerings includes refreshing innovations in equipment, hotel technology, and even luxury guests amenities.

desc.line2: We are available to answer your questions and provide necessary assistance.

policy.text: By sending, I confirm that I have read the privacy policy and consent to the processing of my personal data.
